name: Hayley Reynolds
background: Hayley Reynolds serves as Commissioning Editor, Documentaries at Sky. Focus areas: Documentaries, specialist factual. They are looking for: Sports docs (high-profile athletes/events); music docs about major artists. Overall network strategy: Sky seeks premium, high-end factual content with international appeal and production values that can compete with global streaming platforms while offering distinctive British perspectives.
